thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Reformer Guo Shuqing to Oversee China’s Banks and Insurers

author: Chao Deng
title: Reformer Guo Shuqing to Oversee China’s Banks and Insurers
text:
BEIJING—China’s banking czar is getting a broader remit to oversee not only the nation’s lenders but also the troubled insurance sector, an effort by Beijing to beat back risks from an economy and financial sector fueled by debt. 
Guo Shuqing, a known pro-market reformer and current chairman of the China Banking Regulatory Commission, will lead a newly-combined banking and insurance regulatory commission, according to people familiar with the matter.
...
